import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Col, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Button, Modal, ModalBody, ModalHeader, ModalFooter } from "reactstrap"; import Select from '@material-ui/core/Select' import MenuItem from '@material-ui/core/MenuItem'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getUserById } from '../../services/UsersService'; import Dropdown from 'react-dropdown'; export default class UserDetail extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { id: props.location.id, modal: false, user: {}, mem: '', profession: [ { value: 'PNS', label: 'PNS'}, { value: 'Wirausaha', label: 'Wirausaha'}, { value: 'Wiraswasta', label: 'Wiraswasta'} ], } console.log(this.state.user); } componentDidMount() { this.getUser() } getUser = () => { getUserById(this.state.id).then(response => { this.setState({ user : response.data}) }) } toggleModal = () => { this.setState({ modal: !this.state.modal }) } render() { console.log(this.state.mem) return (
